tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Saurabh really cares for his patients. He has treated my husband and father in law. My husband had to do treatment for pain in tooth. After treatment, he is painfree now.
My father in law had multiple dental issues. Dr. has attended to each problem one by one and has given him a new life it seems. He is so happy to smile and eat all he wants now.

tags: None
review: Instant feedback, perfect guidance and very helpful. Must visit him for any teeth related issues. Going to be my go to doctor for any future dental problems

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Scaling / Polishing, Tooth Extraction,
review: I had multiple problems in my mouth. I primarily visited with pain and swelling in a tooth and deep cavities in a number of other teeth. I also had deposits over my teeth. Dr. Pramanik did a thorough examination of my condition. he also did my digital X-ray.  His prescribed necessary medications and started my treatment.  My pain was reduced . He did my teeth cleaning and polishing, RCTs , crowns and tooth removal gradually. I am very very pleased with his pattern and treatment protocol. I wish him all the best. God bless you doc. Continue the good work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had broken tooth in my lower jaw
Dr. Saurabh Pramanik gave me a soft flexible denture and it matches so beautifully
I can smile now and laugh among my friends and family without shying and covering my mouth. 

Very beautiful work done by Dr. Saurabh Pramanik. Very good work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Dr Saurabh Pramanik with pain in my tooth. He diagnosed and treated me well..Root Canal treatment was totally painless and he gave me the metal free tooth coloured crown and it's suits me very good. 

I recommend him for any dental procedures

very good in behaviour and also very kind towards patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Very honest doctor with very good experience
concern for patients.
clear in explaining my oral health issues like i have initial cavities and its remedies
Recommended him to many people
they also were satisfied **** *** ************** ********always works on appointed time

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
my front teeth were turning yellowish 
visited Dr. Pramanik for a solution
he suggested the most effective treatment that had long term value
he also explained other options but i accepted his best suggestion and am happy to share my smile 
all my front teeth are whiter and natural looking

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My front teeth was broken and i was having sensitivity. Medicine and toothpaste was not helpful. I was concerned and visited Dr. for a solution. As per his suggestion i underwent root canal treatment and crowning. I am highly relieved, no pain and tooth looks very natural after crowning.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a very bad swelling and was unable to open my mouth, eat properly or even talk.
 After visiting Dr. Pramanik, he explained me everything in detail and gave me proper instructions and medicine. My swelling reduced and then I visited for tooth X-ray. My wisdom tooth removal was done smoothly. He also helped me with aftercare and follow ups. I am able to resume my normal daily routine after this treatment. Thank you so much doctor.

tags: None
review: I underwent my RCT, Filling, tooth coloured metal free capping for few of my teeth and I am extremely satisfied with his work. He excellently did my treatment following which i underwent replacement of few missing teeth also. My condition has improved so much and also my teeth looks natural. I am 61 year old and never felt my teeth could look any better.

review: Dr. Pramanik did my root canal for the a tooth which had decayed. He is very friendly and explained everything clearly to me which helps a lot to reduce nervousness while being treated. Would highly recommend visiting him

tags: None
review: *** ** *** **** ****** * **** *** ***** During the 2 and half hour procedure, I have not felt any pain and it was so smooth. Dr. Saurabh Pramanik is so friendly in behaviour, polite and very kind doctor. Thanks for your service sir.

wanted fixed teeth treatment. Doctor done dental implant for both the teeth. Now i can chew and bite naturally. it also looks very good.
really good care dentist.
